Text: Thanks, gonna try this one out.

I do not believe this is official. It's supposed to be a score, for one. Having background noises louder than some of the instrumentals leads me to believe that this was yoinked off of a forum, as I remember someone posted an audio rip straight from the DVD where they tried to tone down the background noises (and claimed to not do a very good job).

Yea, from here:

http://forums.ffshrine.org/f96/devil-2010-score-85584/

I couldn't get the "registered" link to work when I signed up, so I can't really confirm, but I hope this isn't the actual score.
